The format for sending JSON data containing bookmarks to the client:

  *  id is the identifier of the bookmark in the database
  *  link is the actual url
  *  It is recommended that the bookmarks be sorted in the descending order of their rating. 
  *  Stick to the format given below, no extra commas or brackets else json will be broken

{{{
{
  "bookmarks" : [
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark1", "rating": 4},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark2", "rating": 5},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark3", "rating": 3},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark4", "rating": 4},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark5", "rating": 2},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark6", "rating": 1},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark7", "rating": 3},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark8", "rating": 1},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark9", "rating": 1},
    {"id": "anything", "link": "http://localhost/", "description": "bookmark10", "rating": 5}
  ]
};
}}}
